answerText: Leo Tolstoy [or Lev Nikolayevich Tolstoy][10] The short story "Hamlet of the Shchigrovsky District" is found in this short story collection by Ivan Turgenev. This collection also includes "The District Doctor."
heading: NASAT |2013 | 15 | 17 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: For 10 points each, answer the following about Hamlet in Russian literature. [10] This novelist complained that Bardolatry had blinded scholars to the absurdly inconsistent characterization of Hamlet in a scathing critique of Shakespeare. He is better known for writing War and Peace.
